snippet: It is simply untrue that red wine and cheese cannot complement and improve each other.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column says it is simply untrue that red wine and cheese cannot complement and improve each other; good matches abound; to decide categorically that cheese goes only with white wine is to deprive oneself of a great deal of pleasure.
lead_paragraph: It is simply untrue that red wine and cheese cannot complement and improve each other.

headline.print_headline: Cheese and Red Wine, Together Again
headline.seo: New Guidelines Lead to Great Matches — The Pour
headline.main: Cheese and Red Wine, Together Again
